titles.title: CPI-E Act of 2014
To provide for cost-of-living increases for certain Federal benefits programs based on increases in the Consumer Price Index for the elderly.
CPI-E Act of 2014

bill.summary: CPI-E Act of 2014 - Bases cost-of -living increases in benefits under the Civil Service Retirement System, the Federal Employees Retirement System, military retirement and survivor benefit programs, and specified veterans benefits programs on increases in the Consumer Price Index for the elderly.
